content.question: The "mistake" mentioned in the first sentence of the eighth paragraph was to

choices.label: recall a pleasant memory about their home
remind the others how exhausting the firing was
suggest that life at home was uncomfortable
exaggerate the extent to which Harry and Maud Martha could help

content.answer: recall a pleasant memory about their home

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
